channel.title: Variable Combatlevel
channel.description:
I Was Adding Wilderness Levels..And In Case 73 I Added This...
[code] case 73: // Attack (Wilderness)
client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn]; if (p.combatLevel > combatLevel + wildlevel) { if (p.combatLevel < combatLevel + wildlevel) {[/code]
And I Got These Errors...
[code]client.java:13655: cannot find symbol symbol : variable combatLevel location: class client if (p.combatLevel > combatLevel + wildlevel) { ^ client.java:13655: cannot find symbol symbol : variable combatLevel location: class client if (p.combatLevel > combatLevel + wildlevel) { ^ client.java:13656: cannot find symbol symbol : variable combatLevel location: class client if (p.combatLevel < combatLevel + wildlevel) { ^ client.java:13656: cannot find symbol symbol : variable combatLevel location: class client if (p.combatLevel < combatLevel + wildlevel) { ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 4 errors type c to recompile type x to exit Option:[/code]
Please Any Ideas On How To Fix?!

item.title: Variable Combatlevel
item.dc:creator: @Jonny_Rage Jonny Rage
item.description:
@Jonny_Rage wrote:

I Was Adding Wilderness Levels…And In Case 73 I Added This…

[code]
case 73: // Attack (Wilderness)

client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn];
if (p.combatLevel > combatLevel + wildlevel) {
if (p.combatLevel < combatLevel + wildlevel) {[/code]

And I Got These Errors…

client.java:13655: cannot find symbol symbol : variable combatLevel location: class client if (p.combatLevel > combatLevel + wildlevel) { ^ client.java:13655: cannot find symbol symbol : variable combatLevel location: class client if (p.combatLevel > combatLevel + wildlevel) { ^ client.java:13656: cannot find symbol symbol : variable combatLevel location: class client if (p.combatLevel < combatLevel + wildlevel) { ^ client.java:13656: cannot find symbol symbol : variable combatLevel location: class client if (p.combatLevel < combatLevel + wildlevel) { ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 4 errors type c to recompile type x to exit Option:

Please Any Ideas On How To Fix?!
